meta.disclaimer: This is a product concept prototype. Regulatory notes are simplified and for demo only.

Global.title: How to start a small bakery
summary: Define your concept (artisan breads, cakes, or quick-serve).
Create a simple business plan covering startup costs, pricing, and break-even.
Find a compliant commercial kitchen and set up sourcing and logistics.
Register your business, get food-safety approvals, set up basic accounting.
Launch with a soft opening; collect feedback and iterate.

India.title: छोटा बेकरी बिज़नेस कैसे शुरू करें (India)
summary: Business setup: Apply for Udyam MSME registration (optional but helpful); choose proprietorship/LLP/Private Limited as needed.
Licensing: FSSAI Basic/State license (based on revenue), local Shop & Establishment registration, NOC from municipality if applicable.
Compliance: GST registration if turnover crosses threshold; maintain hygiene per FSSAI Schedule 4.
Costs: ₹3–7L starter kit (used deck oven, mixer, racks), ₹50–80k working capital for first month.
Go-to-market: Partner with Swiggy/Zomato; sample at housing societies; Instagram reels in Hinglish.
India.currency_note: All costs in INR (₹). Demo estimates.

Brazil.title: Como abrir uma pequena padaria (Brasil)
summary: Formalização: Abra CNPJ e opte por Simples Nacional se elegível; cadastro municipal.
Sanitário: ANVISA/​Vigilância Sanitária local; alvará de funcionamento e inspeção.
Tributos: ISS/ICMS conforme município/estado; escrituração simples com contador.
Custos: R$20–45 mil para equipamentos básicos usados; capital de giro 1–2 meses.
Lançamento: Parcerias com iFood/Rappi; promoções matinais (pão francês + café).
Brazil.currency_note: Custos em BRL (R$). Estimativas de demo.

Japan.title: 小規模ベーカリーの始め方（日本）
summary: 法人形態: 合同会社（GK）または株式会社（KK）を検討。個人事業も可。
届出: 食品衛生責任者の設置、保健所への営業許可申請（施設基準あり）。
衛生: 食品衛生法に基づく設備・動線・温度管理の記録を整備。
コスト: 中古オーブン/ミキサー等で¥800k–¥1.8M目安、家賃はエリア依存。
販売: テイクアウト中心で開始、近隣オフィス向けのランチ便、Line公式で予約。

Global.title: How to open a student savings account
summary: Pick a bank with fee waivers for students and a solid mobile app.
Bring ID, proof of address, and student proof; book an appointment if required.
Enable online banking and set alerts; start an auto‑transfer for savings.

India.title: स्टूडेंट सेविंग्स अकाउंट कैसे खोलें (India)
summary: Documentation: Aadhaar, PAN (or Form 60), student ID/admission letter, address proof.
Account: Youth/Student variants often waive AMB and debit card fees; UPI-enabled.
Tip: Set ₹1,000 monthly auto‑sweep; enable UPI Lite for small payments.

Brazil.title: Como abrir conta poupança estudantil (Brasil)
summary: Docs: RG/CPF, comprovante de residência, comprovante de matrícula.
Taxas: Muitos bancos isentam tarifas para estudantes; app é essencial.
Dica: Configure transferência automática mensal; monitore metas no app.

Japan.title: 学生向け普通預金口座の開設（日本）
summary: 必要書類: 本人確認書類、在学証明、住所確認資料。
手数料: 学生向け優遇（ATM・振込手数料割引など）を確認。
Tips: 通知設定・貯蓄用サブ口座を作り、自動振替で貯蓄習慣化。

Global.title: How to register an e‑commerce business
summary: Choose a structure (sole proprietor vs company) and check name availability.
Register for taxes, set up a business bank account, and pick a payment gateway.
Write a privacy policy, returns policy, and terms; set up analytics.

India.title: ई‑कॉमर्स बिज़नेस रजिस्टर कैसे करें (India)
summary: Entity: Proprietorship/LLP/Private Ltd; apply for PAN for the entity as needed.
Tax: GST registration if threshold met or for inter‑state sales/marketplaces.
Policies: Returns, privacy (DPDP Act alignment), grievance redressal contact.
Marketplaces: ONDC/Amazon/Flipkart compliance; invoice with GSTIN.

Brazil.title: Como registrar um negócio de e‑commerce (Brasil)
summary: Estrutura: MEI/ME ou LTDA; abra CNPJ.
Fiscal: Emissão de nota fiscal eletrônica (NF‑e); escolha regime (Simples, etc.).
Políticas: Devolução (CDC), privacidade (LGPD), SAC e prazos claros.

Japan.title: EC事業の登録方法（日本）
summary: 形態: 個人事業 or 法人（GK/KK）。屋号・商号の確認。
税務: 開業届、消費税の取り扱い確認、インボイス制度対応。
規程: 返品・特商法表記・プライバシーポリシー（個人情報保護法）。
